Package controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
controller.UserController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdministratorController
public class UserController extends Object
The UserController class is a super class that provides methods to access and retrieve user-related information from the UserRepository.

  • Method Details

    • generateUID

      public static String generateUID(User user)
      Generates a unique ID (UID) for the personnel based on their type.
      Parameters:
      user - the type of personnel (Administrator, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist)
      Returns:
      a unique UID string for the personnel

    • addUser

      public static boolean addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user (e.g., Doctor, Patient, etc.) to the system.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to be added
      Returns:
      true if user is successfully added, false if the data is invalid

    • determinePersonnelType

      private static User determinePersonnelType(User personnel)

    • removeUser

      public static boolean removeUser(String UID, User type)
      Removes a user from the system based on their UID and type.
      Parameters:
      UID - the UID of the user to be removed
      type - the type of user (Administrator, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist)
      Returns:
      true if user is successfully removed, false if UID is invalid or user not found

    • updatePersonnel

      public static boolean updatePersonnel(String UID, User updatedPersonnel)
      Updates the details of a personnel member based on their UID.
      Parameters:
      UID - the UID of the personnel to update
      updatedPersonnel - the new personnel data
      Returns:
      true if the personnel is successfully updated, false otherwise

    • getPatientById

      public static Patient getPatientById(String UID)
      Retrieves a patient by their UID.
      Parameters:
      UID - the UID of the patient to retrieve
      Returns:
      the Patient object if found, or null if not found

    • updatePatientParticulars

      public static boolean updatePatientParticulars(String UID, Patient updatedPatient)
      Updates a patient's particulars by UID.
      Parameters:
      UID - the UID of the patient to update
      updatedPatient - the updated patient details
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise
